title: Absolute Boyfriend
resume: Zettai Kareshi is a 2008 Japanese romance comedy drama television series based on the original manga novel "Absolute Boyfriend" by Yuu Watase. Mokomichi Hayami plays Night Tenjo's role while actress Saki Aibu plays Riiko Izawa.
